 CxList apex = Find_Apex_Files();
CxList idDef = apex.FindByType("id").FindByType(typeof(UnknownReference)) 
	+ apex.FindByShortName("id").GetByAncs(All.GetParameters(Find_DB_Inactive()))
	+ apex.FindByName("id").GetFathers().FindByType(typeof(MethodDecl))
	+ Find_Schema_sObjects().GetMembersOfTarget().FindByShortName("id", false);
result = All.FindAllReferences(idDef);
